message.title: Avoid your services being suspended
message.text:
Unfortunately, your last Direct Debit payment hasn’t gone through as there weren’t enough funds in your bank account. This means that there is now <Currency code><Resubmitted Amount> overdue on your Sky account.

We’ll automatically make another request for payment on or just after the <Resubmission Date>. Or you can update your payment date on the right of this message.

Please make sure that there is enough money in your bank account to cover the amount due to avoid your Sky services being suspended. Also, you may be charged a <Late Payment Fee Reminder> late payment fee.

message.title: Your Sky set-up is only three days away
message.text:
We’re looking forward to putting on a show for you – and there’s so much unmissable TV coming up.

To make sure everything goes smoothly in three days’ time, please read on so you know what to do before then and what your engineer will need.

Your engineer will contact you by 9am the day of the visit to give you an idea of what time they’ll arrive.

So your engineer can show you how everything works (like your Sky remote), where things are in your on-screen guide, plus give you a few handy tips, please make sure a responsible adult is at home on the big day.

If you need to change your appointment, just select 'Reschedule' on the right of this message.

See you soon.

message.title: Confirmation of your Sky TV cancellation
message.text:
Your subscription will end soon.

Please select ‘Find out more’ to review your options.

If there’s an outstanding balance on your account, you’ll need to pay this as soon as possible. To view your bill:

Sky Q: Select ‘My Account’ from the TV Menu

Sky+: Press the Interactive button on your remote and select ‘My Account’

message.title: Your first Sky bill, everything you need to know.
message.text:
Thank you for joining Sky – it’s great to have you on board. So everything’s clear from the word go, we need to give you some important information.

<Debit Balance><Credit Balance>

If you have a welcome offer, you’ll find all the details on your bill.

From the second month, your monthly payment will be taken from your bank account on the date shown on your bill.

Please select the ‘View Bill’ button to view your bill.

Once again, thanks for joining Sky.

message.title: Provide new payment details to avoid your services being suspended
message.text:
Your bank has told us that your Direct Debit payment instruction has been cancelled.

We’ll need you to provide us with new Direct Debit details to avoid your Sky services being suspended. Also, you may be charged a <Late Payment Fee Reminder>late payment fee.

Please select the ‘Update details’ button to set up a new Direct Debit.

If you intend to reuse payment details previously provided to us, you may want to contact your bank to ensure there is no restriction in place.

Please note that if you no longer wish to be a Sky customer, you will need to contact us to complete the cancellation process and avoid additional charges.

message.title: Email Invalid
message.text:
Hello,

We emailed but the delivery failed.

Please update your email address by selecting 'Update email address' on the right of this message.

Thanks
